about_the_game:
Meet world's first dancing digital human in a virtual world.

'K-pop Dance in VR' is a teaser video of a VR experience where a digital celebrity dancing along her song in front of you.

With the state-of-the-art digital human technology developed by Reality Reflection, you can now interact with your favorite star at home real-time.

Experience the ultimate character rendering technology in VR, see how realistic a virtual move and facial expression can be. Feel the realistic breath of your favorite star and make eye contact with her throughout the performance.
